comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm w/ you, bro.' See you at 12:30.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Do we really have a section on Sunshine Canyon named for the Frenz? If so, that's cool.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Greg, It's true. Dave didn't Photoshop that! Now we just have to get some bags and be familiar with how to react to a meth lab, should we stumble upon Dave's distillery: [http://tinyurl.com/5qu4pu](http://tinyurl.com/5qu4pu) This is going to be fun, huh?!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: This changes everything. The Frenzy is no longer a ragtag, loose-knit band of biking ne'er-do-wells, but is now, instead, a real _organization_, like the Cub Scouts or the Elks or the Retired Mail Handlers of America. Whatever. The point is, we're officially _official_ now. Take a memo; we need a press secretary, someone to handle all of our PR stuff and run interference when we need it. Who? Scott McClellen? He's available you say?
